did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: School of Hotel Administration Associate Dean for Academic Affairs records, 1982-2005.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration. Associate Dean for Academic Affairs.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes reports, committee meeting minutes, correspondence, publications, and subject files pertaining to curriculum development and the Associate Dean for Academic Affairs Office.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes reports, committee meeting minutes, correspondence, publications, and subject files pertaining to curriculum development and the Associate Dean for Academic Affairs Office.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Hotel management schools -- New York (State) -- Ithaca.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of the office of origin.

prefercite.p: School of Hotel Administration Associate Dean for Academic Affairs Records, #28-1-2411. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
